title: Does your child play with them?
description: OpenAI announced parental controls for its ChatGPT tool a few weeks ago amid concerns about the dangers of youth using artificial intelligence technology, including cases of teens dying by suicide.
content:
OpenAI announced parental controls for its ChatGPT tool a few weeks ago amid concerns about the dangers of youth using artificial intelligence technology, including cases of teens dying by suicide.

title: UK spy chief warns of AI danger, though not disaster
description: Tech leaders have warned about the dangers of unchecked AI, and that people should be concerned about a "Terminator" future, as seen in the film series about an artificial intelligence system that becomes self-aware and tries to wipe out humanity.
content:

title: ABB CEO 'very confident' of demand for data centers powering AI
description: Switzerland's ABB is "very confident" about future demand from data centers that power artificial intelligence, its CEO Morten Wierod told Reuters.
content:
The engineering company has seen double-digit percentage growth this year in orders for electrification products from data centers being built to meet AI and cloud computing demand.

title: Microsoft: Russia, China increasingly using AI to escalate cyberattacks on the US
description: Russia, China, Iran and North Korea are using artificial intelligence to improve their cyberattacks on U.S. companies, governments and individuals, according to new research from Microsoft.
